mapper.sql:
SELECT T.*,
FROM AUTHEN_ENDUSER_SECRET_KEY T LEFT JOIN CM_USER_INFO V ON T.USER_ID=V.USER_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHEN_ENDUSER_SECRET_KEY SET UPDATED_DT = , UPDATED_BY = #{mdps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_SID = #{mdss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{dataDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PASSORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{endUser.atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ENDUSER_SECRET_KEY_ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

from AUTHEN_ENDUSER_SECRET_KEY where ENDUSER_SECRET_KEY_ID = #{atid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
